query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS integration_connections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  customerId INT NOT NULL,
  integration ENUM('google_business', 'meta', 'quickbooks') NOT NULL,
  connectionStatus ENUM('not_connected', 'connected', 'error') DEFAULT 'not_connected' NOT NULL,
  externalAccountId VARCHAR(255),
  externalAccountName VARCHAR(255),
  accessToken TEXT,
  refreshToken TEXT,
  tokenExpiresAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  lastSyncAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  lastSyncStatus ENUM('success', 'partial', 'failed'),
  lastSyncError TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  customerId INT NOT NULL,
  integration ENUM('google_business', 'meta', 'quickbooks') NOT NULL,
  connectionStatus ENUM('not_connected', 'connected', 'error') DEFAULT 'not_connected' NOT NULL,
  externalAccountId VARCHAR(255),

  accessToken TEXT,
  refreshToken TEXT,
  tokenExpiresAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  lastSyncAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  lastSyncStatus ENUM('success', 'partial', 'failed'),
  lastSyncError TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
